How It Works

Simple by design

01

Connect Wallet

One SUI wallet to rule them all. Connect and Manbow handles cross-chain via IKA.

02

Choose Chains

Pick a source chain to lend and a target chain to borrow from.

03

Lend & Borrow

Execute both in a single transaction. IKA bridges the communication.

04

Manage

Track, repay, and withdraw across all chains from one dashboard.

Base

IKA is the interoperability layer that lets your SUI wallet sign and execute transactions across every supported chain. No bridges. No wrapping.
